metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15675 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: When processing surfaces, the lifetime may outlive a persistent buffer leading to memory corruption and a potentially exploitable crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 81.

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '81.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
